dict.string: All fiat currency and crypto converter
All fiat currency and crypto converter

# üí± yConverter Alfred Workflow
- üíö `cc 2 usdt try` to convert `2 USDT` to `TRY` value - üéâ Complex queries like `2 TRY PHP` is working now! - üîê To use this workflow you need to check out "Get Your Free Api Key for FIAT" section - ‚Ü©Ô∏è Press enter (‚åÖ) to paste result
> For more detail check out: https://github.com/yedhrab/YConverter
## üîë Get Your Free Api Key for FIAT
- Click the link: https://openexchangerates.org/signup/free - Sign up - Verify your email and use the key that send to your e-mail
## üëÆ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Free Forex API Rate Limits
- Currency Pairs per Request: 2 - Number of Requests per Hour: 100 - Date Range in History: 8 Days - Allowed Back in History: 1 Year(s)
## Crypto Convertion
- Crypto convertion uses **Binance** tickers - There is no limit
## üóÑ Cache System
- All data is stored in `$HOME/yconverter.yml` - All cached pair value are refreshed every **10 mins** for fiat, **1 min** for crypto
